
stop_tty_vc

   Stop the TTY visualisation client.

Type
   library(tty_vc)

Description

	     This predicate stops the TTY visualisation client (VC). It will no longer react to viewables.

Resatisfiable
   no

Fail Conditions
   Fails if there is no TTY VC.

See Also
   start_tty_vc / 1, start_tty_vc / 2, start_tty_vc / 3
